body_html: I'd prefer not to skip NN during the ASAN tests, because the bug (segfault for col2im based kernels) that sent me down this road was in our NN code. I did more investigating and there does seem to be a red flag allocation which might offer us an alternative way to solve this problem. See #5522 (comment)
body_text: I'd prefer not to skip NN during the ASAN tests, because the bug (segfault for col2im based kernels) that sent me down this road was in our NN code. I did more investigating and there does seem to be a red flag allocation which might offer us an alternative way to solve this problem. See #5522 (comment)
body: I'd prefer not to skip NN during the ASAN tests, because the bug (segfault for col2im based kernels) that sent me down this road was in our NN code. I did more investigating and there does seem to be a red flag allocation which might offer us an alternative way to solve this problem. See https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5522#issuecomment-369961444
